channel.title: Hey There! on Kevin Foster
channel.description: Recent content in Hey There! on Kevin Foster

item.title: The Cookie Law Conundrum: Well-Intentioned but Flawed
item.description: If you’ve visited a website in the past few years, you’ve seen it: the now-ubiquitous cookie consent pop-up.

item.title: The PHP Paradox
item.description: Walk into any tech forum, and you’ll find a familiar debate raging about PHP. It’s a language often criticized for its inconsistencies, yet it powers a significant portion of the web.

item.title: The Silent Cost of Ignoring Your Engineers
item.description: In the relentless pursuit of growth and profit, a dangerous schism has emerged in the software industry.

item.title: Tribal Tests: How Harsh Environments Expose a Lack of Wisdom
item.description: When we romanticize tribal life, we imagine close-knit communities guided by the serene wisdom of elders.

item.title: When Management Works Against Itself in Software Development
item.description: A common issue in software development is the disconnect between management priorities and the engineering practices required for long-term success.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a freelance software developer based in Liverpool, England, with 20 years of experience developing software.

item.title: Recommendations
item.description: Alen Bubich Co-Founder, CityBlast Media Inc. If you’re looking for a programmer who cares about the quality of his code and more importantly cares about your business, Kevin is your guy.
